RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GILLIGAN stalked the pace looming outside the leader in upper stretch rallying late to win clear. ROYAL CRUSADER slow early swung out to lane rallying late seven wide getting up for place. JULIE'S FERRARI set the pace digging in to upper stretch ceding late to outside pressure. HONOR LIFE tracked the pace to upper stretch lacking surge there at mid track. KANTPAYTHETOLL dropped off on the turn. GOTTAGETITBACK faded on the turn. TEN TWENTY NINE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Crusader
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out to lane, came on late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, dug in lane, ceded to outside pressure

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Twenty Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Gilligan
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed outside leader lane, rallied up late

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Kantpaythetoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped off on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: U SO MONEY BABY surged on the inside to upper stretch drawing even abreast foe edging clear late. LOVE TO ZOOM slow early circled out to upper stretch coming on late six wide. SILVER STICK STAIR pressed from the rail to take the lead in upper stretch ceding late on the inside. MIZZEN pressured through the turn weakening in upper stretch. GOLDEN ACCOUNT pressed on lead through the turn tiring in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Love to Zoom
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out to lane, came on late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Stick Stair
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed from rail, led lane, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Account
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: U So Money Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged inside to lane, abreast foe, went clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Consi dered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIO MARIA set the pace being hooked on the far turn responding to clear in upper stretch holding safe along the inside. TIMELY SECRET advanced on the backside drawing even abreast rival on the far turn being rebuffed in upper stretch staying on willingly late. LOST BIKINI tracked the pace making no headway to upper stretch finishing evenly. REACHING STRIDE raced evenly to the far turn fading there. IRON BERTIE gave early retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave early retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Gio Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, shook clear lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Reaching Stride
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Bikini
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Timely Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, drew even far turn, rebuffed lane, stayed on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since Septem ber 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUTH sent clear set the pace drawing off on the far turn proving much the best. CONFESSOR raced evenly rallying while in close on the far turn emerging in upper stretch chasing rival to wire. ESCAPE VELOCITY tracked the pace racing evenly the final half mile. DYRDEK stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch weakening there. APPRAISAL saved ground being in tight and forced to steady near the three eighths pole. STRIKE THE TOP played no factor. EXECUTIVE PRIZE folded up early. COMMANDER KEITH in close at the break labored well back. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF APPRAISAL AGAINST THE RIDER OF CONFESSOR FOR INTERFERENCE NEAR THE THREE EIGHTHS POLE WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Couth
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, drew off driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Dyrdek
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Appraisal
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, in tight steadied 3/8 pole

ENTRY.NAME: Escape Velocity
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Confessor
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, rallied to far turn, in close, emerged lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close break, labored

ENTRY.NAME: Strike the Top
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Executive Prize
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 70. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Est imating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH DOLLAR DATE stalked the pace pressing to lead at the quarter pole drawing off down the lane under a drive. THE ISABEL ASTRAY advanced to threaten on the far turn chasing to upper stretch proving no match late saving place. WANDA SUSIE DOOZY sent clear set the pace being hooked on the far turn weakening the final eighth. HIGH FASHION LADY slow early gave a mild rally on the far turn racing evenly down the lane. UNESCORTED was never involved. LUNAR UNIT a step slow early folded up on the far turn. MY DANCING QUEEN hustled along in early pursuit would wilt on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: The Isabel Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: advanced far turn, chased into lane, no match saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Wanda Susie Doozy
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: High Fashion Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally far turn, evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Unit
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up far turn

ENTRY.NAME: High Dollar Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed to lead far turn, drew off driving,

ENTRY.NAME: My Dancing Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, used up,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KOSHER COWBOY alert to the top sped off on lead to upper stretch holding safe to wire. OUT OF CENTS chased the pace to upper stretch closing the gap late. WELLMAN slow early gave an even finish. SHELTOWEE'S BALI weakened on the turn. DEVILS RED trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Devils Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Wellman
ENTRY.OWNER: Brumley, Jerry S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheltowee's Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: weakened on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Kosher Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, sped off to lane, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Cents
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, closed gap late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Races Not Considered) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LISA pressured the pace dueling four deep through the turn then abreast rival down the lane getting up gamely. TWILIGHT VISION pressed the pace dueling from the inside to upper stretch battling to the wire along the rail. TEMPLEMENT slow early circled out to upper stretch coming on late six wide. J L'S ROCKETTE pressed hard through the turn weakening in upper stretch. INCESSANT pressed the pace dueling between horses through the turn weakening in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Twilight Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside to lane, battled to wire on rail

ENTRY.NAME: J L's Rockette
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Incessant
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Templement
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out lane, came on late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled four deep on turn, abreast lane, gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHARP JUSTICE set the pace widening to upper stretch becoming weary late holding on the last strides. QUEEN OF CLASS stalked the pace coming between horses upper stretch surging gamely on the final yards. MISS NUCKOLS chased the pace extending to upper stretch drifting out while closing in late. RUN AWAY FEVER chased the pace saving ground to upper stretch bidding gamely on the rail. PREMIER WISH slow early, played no factor. G MONEY LIV pressed then chased on the turn tiring in upper stretch. DE PURA SANGRE dropped back on the turn. LELAWALA slow early rallied on the inside down the lane clipping heels losing the rider near the wire, walked off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, saved ground to lane, right there on the rail

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of Class
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables Tenenbaum Jeffrey and Bloom Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, extended to lane, surged late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied inside, clipped heels, late rally near wire

ENTRY.NAME: Premier Wish
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sharp Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, widened to lane, weary late, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Nuckols
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended to lane, drifted out gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: G Money Liv
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed then chased to lane, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: De Pura Sangre
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back on turn
